1884178.effect: You can substitute this card for any 1 Fusion Material Monster, but the other Fusion Material Monster(s) must be correct. You can Tribute Fusion Material Monsters on the field, including this face-up card; Special Summon 1 corresponding FIRE Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck.
1884178.name: The Fire - Hex-Sealed Fusion

1884173.effect: You can substitute this card for any 1 Fusion Material Monster, but the other Fusion Material Monster(s) must be correct. You can Tribute Fusion Material Monsters on the field, including this face-up card; Special Summon 1 corresponding WATER Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck.
1884173.name: The Water - Hex-Sealed Fusion

1884176.effect: You can substitute this card for any 1 Fusion Material Monster, but the other Fusion Material Monster(s) must be correct. You can Tribute Fusion Material Monsters on the field, including this face-up card; Special Summon 1 corresponding WIND Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck.
1884176.name: The Wind - Hex-Sealed Fusion

1884314.effect:
Activate 1 of these effects.
● Add 1 "Fusion" or "Polymerization" Normal Trap from your Deck to your hand.
● For the rest of this turn, if you would Fusion Summon a monster from your Extra Deck using only cards in your possession as material, 1 face-up monster on your field can be used as a substitute for any 1 Fusion Material whose name is specifically listed on the Fusion Monster Card, but the other Fusion Material(s) must be correct.
1884314.name: Fusion Fire Field

1884188.effect: Once per turn, during your End Phase: You can target 1 banished "Fusion" or "Polymerization" Spell/Trap; Set it to your field, but shuffle it into the Deck when it leaves the field. Once per turn, during your opponent's End Phase if you have no Synchro, Xyz, or Link Monsters on your field or in your GY: You can target 1 "Fusion" or "Polymerization" Spell/Trap in your GY; add it to your hand. You can only control 1 "Muddy Swamp".
1884188.name: Muddy Swamp

1884192.effect: Fusion Summon 1 WATER Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, using monsters from your hand or field as Fusion Material. If you control "Umi", you can also use 1 monster that specifically lists "Umi" in its text in your Deck as Fusion Material. For the rest of this turn, you cannot use monsters for the Summon of a Fusion Monster, with the same original names as the monsters used as material for this Fusion Summon.
1884192.name: Wave Fusion

1884311.effect: During your Standby Phase, if you control no Fusion Monsters: You can add 1 "Polymerization" from your GY to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Polymer Converter" once per turn. Once per turn, during the Main Phase: You can discard 1 "Polymerization"; add 1 "Fusion" or "Polymerization" Normal Spell from your Deck to your hand. If your opponent has at least twice the total cards in their hand and field than you do , you can activate this card, the turn it is Set.
1884311.name: Polymer Converter

1884247.effect:
1 "Mudragon" monster + 1 Fusion Monster on your field
Must first be Fusion Summoned. This card gains 500 ATK/DEF for each Fusion Monster on the field or is in the GYs. You can only use 1 of the following effects of "Ancestral Mudragon of the Hex-Sealed Swamp" per turn, and only once that turn, also if you control no other monsters they are Quick Effects.
● During the Main Phase: You can Special Summon 1 Fusion Monster from your GY in Defense Position. 
● During the Main Phase: You can target 1 "Fusion" or "Polymerization" Normal Trap OR Normal or Quick-Play Spell in your GY; banish it, and if you do, this effect becomes that card's effect when that card is activated.
1884247.name: Ancestral Mudragon of the Hex-Sealed Swamp
1884247.treated_as: Ancestral Mudragon of the Hex-Sealed Swamp

1884266.effect:
1 "Mudragon" monster + 1 "of the Swamp" monster
Once per turn, 1 face-up monster on your field can be used as a substitute for any 1 Fusion Material whose name is specifically listed on the Fusion Monster Card, but the other Fusion Material(s) must be correct. Once per turn, if a Fusion Monster(s) is Special Summoned: You can target 1 card in either GY; banish it. During your turn (Quick Effect): You can Fusion Summon 1 monster from your Extra Deck, using monster from your hand or field as material, including a "Mudragon" or "of the Swamp" monster. You can only use this effect of "The Hex-Sealed Mudragon" once per turn.
1884266.name: King Mudragon of the Swamp

1884254.effect:
1 "Mudragon" monster + 1 "Hex-Sealed" monster
Once per turn, 1 face-up monster on your field can be used as a substitute for any 1 Fusion Material whose name is specifically listed on the Fusion Monster Card, but the other Fusion Material(s) must be correct. Once per turn, if a Fusion Monster(s) is Special Summoned: You can target 1 card on the field; destroy it. During your opponent's turn (Quick Effect): You can Fusion Summon 1 monster from your Extra Deck, using monster from your hand or field as material, including a "Mudragon" or "Hex-Sealed" monster. You can only use this effect of "The Hex-Sealed Mudragon" once per turn.
1884254.name: The Hex-Sealed Mudragon
